name: SciFi Level
description:
Godot engine demo level for Godot Beta 1 (Classical build)
The demo is relatively large so it can take a minute or slightly longer to load depending on your system. All assets and code are MIT licensed and free for commercial or personal use!

Demonstrates a basic 3rd/1st person free look camera with zoom, collision, FPS counter, 3D sound with a volume slider and UI with an options screen .

Options
Alt-Enter: Fullscreen
Shift-Enter: Vsync
Home: Reload
F1: Title screen
F2: Options

A Windows exe (64 bit) build of the demo is included so you can play with it right away but the Godot engine Beta 1 is needed for the project files.  The Godot engine is only around a 50 MB download. 

Godot Engine Beta 1
https://godotengine.org/article/dev-snapshot-godot-3-1-beta-1
Download Godot 3.1 Beta 1
https://downloads.tuxfamily.org/godotengine/3.1/beta1/
